players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: remained silent.
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and found them mafia. Alice was killed last night, confirming. We must vote Charlie out."
You: "I agree with Diana – Charlie is the mafia. Let’s vote him out so the town can survive."
You: "Diana’s investigation is solid. Charlie is mafia. Vote him out."
Charlie: "..."
Diana: "Charlie, you know I'm detective. I found you mafia. Vote me out? No. Vote you out."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
